net.realmproject.dcm.event.bus

Interface DeviceEventBus

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DeviceEventSender
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IDeviceEventBus

    public interface DeviceEventBus
extends DeviceEventSender
    A DeviceEventBus is a component which can have IDeviceEvents broadcast from any source to the components which subscribe to it. This provides a looser coupling than a traditional direct listener-based model, as consumers don't need to be aware of and registered with every producer of events.

    It is also possible to split a larger collection of devices into regions by using more than one DeviceEventBus. Events from one bus can be selectively propagated to another using an IDeviceEventBusForwarder or using a distributed messaging system like ActiveMQ (see AbstractDeviceMessageEncoder and DeviceMessageDecoder).

    A DeviceEventBus has a region property which allows splitting busses into logical groups not related to the actual bus topology. DeviceEventBusses should not broadcast events from other regions if those events are marked private.
    Author:
    NAS

      • Methods inherited from interface net.realmproject.dcm.event.sender.DeviceEventSender

        hasSent, isSending, sendCount, setSending, startSending, stopSending

    • Method Detail

      • broadcast

        boolean broadcast(IDeviceEvent event)
        Send a IDeviceEvent to all subscribers of this bus. Broadcasting is done asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to broadcast
        Returns:
        true if event is accepted for broadcast, false otherwise.

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(java.util.function.Consumer<IDeviceEvent> subscriber)
        Listen for events broadcast on this event bus. All events will be sent to this subscriber.
        Parameters:
        subscriber - The consumer of events

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(java.util.function.Consumer<IDeviceEvent> subscriber,
               java.util.function.Predicate<IDeviceEvent> filter)
        Listen for events broadcast on this event bus. Only events accepted by the given filter will be sent to this subscriber.
        Parameters:
        subscriber - the consumer of events
        filter - rule for which events to listen for

      • getRegion

        java.lang.String getRegion()
        Gets the region for this this DeviceEventBus. Larger or more complex collections of devices can be split up into regions. Events can be filtered by region to isolate certain devices, or to keep the number of events to a minimum
        Returns:
        the region of this bus
